comments.comment: Mr.Fonseka, if you are  genuine leader, have great skills   please protect magnificent Sri Lankan Elephants  I from Canada; did lots of  work in Nambia, Boswana to protect Elephants. One of the Director from Sri Lanka Wild life helping Sri Lanka MP to captures Elephants and gave them to keep at home as a result he making lots of illegal money. You must stop all these. Try to be very successful true leader. I have faith towards to you;  not for weak SrI Lankan President and Priminister. They are very weak do not have any leaderships skills. Whole world know that. At least you make the difference. PLEASE PROTECT SRI LANKA ELEPHANTS.
